'''''Amon Hen'' 224''' is the two-hundred-and-twenty-fourth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in [[July]] [[2010]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''[[:Image:AmonHen224.jpg|...one morning long ago... Gandalf came by]]''
** By: Colin Williams
* Editorial
** By: [[Andrew Butler]]
* Contents
* Artwork: ''[[Samwise Gamgee|Sam]] and [[Bill the Pony|Bill]]''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]
* Announcements
* [[Oxonmoot]] Announcements
* Report: Northern Hemisphere Seminar in Birmingham
** By: Ian Collier
* [[International Tolkien Fellowship|International]] Upcoming Events
** By: Susan Frances Edwards
* [[Hall of Fire]]
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* The Storyteller of Ba Be
** By: Lê Tường-Phi
* The Mystery of the [[The One Ring|Ring]]'s Destruction
** By: Chris Mac Arthur
* Behind Glass Doors
** By: Madeline Flint
* Review: ''[[The Lord of the Films]]''
** By: Lynn Forest-Hill
* Review: ''[[The First Ring]]'' Compilation CD
** By: Michael Cunningham
* Letters
* Around the World in 80(?) Societies
** [[Unquendor]]
* News from [[Fangorn Forest|Fangorn]]
** By: Carol Brownlow
* [[Mathoms|Mathom]]
** By: Anne Mathison
* Jessica's Corner
** By: Jessica Yates
* New Members
** Member Profile
** By: Linda Pallett
* Dates for your Diary/Committee
